DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 study patient low intermediate-1 risk myelodysplastic syndrome ( MDS ) receive investigational study drug ARRY-614 . This study 2 part . In first part , patient receive increase dos study drug order achieve high dose study drug possible cause unacceptable side effect . Approximately 50 patient US enrol Part 1 ( Completed ) . In second part study , patient receive best dose study drug determine first part study follow see side effect effectiveness study drug , , treat cancer . Approximately 30 patient US enrol Part 2 ( Completed ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study ARRY-614 Patients With Low Intermediate-1 Risk Myelodysplastic Syndromes
DOC.criteria: Key Inclusion Criteria ( Part 1 Part 2 ) : Diagnosis MDS bone marrow biopsy . International Prognostic Scoring System ( IPSS ) score low intermediate1 risk MDS . May receive prior therapy MDS . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status ( PS ) 0 , 1 2 . Adequate liver renal function . Additional criterion exist . Key Exclusion Criteria ( Part 1 Part 2 ) : History bone marrow transplant . Treatment MDS transfusion stable dose ( â‰¥ 4 week ) hematopoietic growth factor day first dose study drug . Concomitant malignancies previous malignancy less 2year diseasefree interval time enrollment . Treatment investigational medicinal product expect clear first dose study drug demonstrate prolonged side effect . Treatment azacitidine decitabine within 2 week prior first dose study drug . Chronic use ( > 2 week ) great physiologic dos corticosteroid ( dose equivalent > 20 mg/day prednisone ) within 4 week prior first dose study drug . Treatment immunomodulatory agent within 4 week prior first dose study drug . Additional criterion exist .
